p:
The Qiagen ResPlex II V2.0 kit, which uses a target‐enriched multiplexing RT‐PCR amplification combined with a suspension array detection, detects a total of 17 respiratory viruses, including Flu A/B, PIV 1/2/3/4, RSV, hMPV, rhinoviruses (RVs), enterovirus (EV), human bocavirus (hBoV), hAdV, four coronaviruses (229E, OC43, NL63, and HKU1) and FluA pdm09 from 438 nasopharyngeal swab specimens.
78 The specificity of the test was about 92.9% to 100%. The sensitivity for PIV3, hMPV, PIV1 and BoV was reported to be 73.1%, 70%, 66.7%, and 55.6%, respectively, but the sensitivity for FluA, EnV, OC43, RSV and H1N1 was relatively low.
78
